thread.title: Andy Hicks
thread.title_full: Zopa Ltd reviewed by Andy Hicks

author: Andy Hicks
title: Andy Hicks
text:
This is a great way to get a loan, generally cheaper rates that the banks and definitely better that those pay day loans. really easy to apply and get set up.
one of the best thinks I can say, is that you can pay off additional sums if you wish and/or repay early, and there are no early repayment fees, so straight forward.
This is the second time I have used Zopa and will indeed use them again should the need arise
thank you
